title: San Diego/Balboa Park-Hillcrest
name: Reuben H. Fleet Science Center
price: $13 adults, $12 seniors, $11 children, free for children under 3 (''theater admission separate'')
content: This popular science museum is filled with dozens of well-done interactive exhibits of interest to children, young adults and grown-ups too. There's also an IMAX theater in the building, one of the world's first.
